meaningMnemonic: This word consists of kanji with hiragana attached. Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>see</kanji> so the vocab here means <vocabulary>to see</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to look</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading for this word is the same as the reading you learned with the kanji (kun'yomi) so you should be able to read this.
